languages.text: {n}Хротко горд и напыщен. Джиневри кусает ноготь, будто не решается сказать что-то. Мастер дисциплины молчит и задумчиво смотрит на рабочего. Кляйн застыл с гримасой недоверия. Кажется, никто, кроме Хротко, не верит, что перед вами настоящий преступник.{/n}

{n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хротко горд и напыщен. Джиневри кусает ноготь, будто не решается сказать что-то. Мастер дисциплины молчит и задумчиво смотрит на рабочего. Кляйн застыл с гримасой недоверия. Кажется, никто, кроме Хротко, не верит, что перед вами настоящий преступник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevra is biting her nail as if hesitant to say something. Sauerback watches the worker without saying a word, thinking. Klein stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko affiche un air suffisant tandis que Jinevri se ronge les ongles comme si elle hésitait à s'exprimer. De son côté, Sauerback observe l'ouvrier sans mot dire, apparemment absorbée dans ses pensées. Quant à Klein, il reste planté là sans bouger avec une grimace sceptique. Hrotko mis à part, personne ici ne semble croire que vous avez devant vous le vrai coupable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko affiche un air suffisant tandis que Jinevra se ronge les ongles comme si elle hésitait à s'exprimer. De son côté, Sauerback observe l'ouvrier sans mot dire, apparemment absorbée dans ses pensées. Quant à Klein, il reste planté là sans bouger avec une grimace sceptique. Hrotko mis à part, personne ici ne semble croire que vous avez devant vous le vrai coupable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko parece orgulloso y altivo. Jinevri se muerde las uñas, como si quisiera decir algo. Sauerback observa en silencio al trabajador, aparentemente absorta en sus pensamientos. Mientras, Klein lo mira con recelo sin moverse. Parece que Hrotko es el único que cree que tenéis delante al verdadero culpable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko parece orgulloso y altivo. Jinevra se muerde las uñas, como si quisiera decir algo. Sauerback observa en silencio al trabajador, aparentemente absorta en sus pensamientos. Mientras, Klein lo mira con recelo sin moverse. Parece que Hrotko es el único que cree que tenéis delante al verdadero culpable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡看起来洋洋自得。杰尼娃咬着指甲，似乎在犹豫着要不要说些什么。苏尔贝克静静地看着眼前的工人，显然陷入了沉思。而克莱因一动不动，皱着眉头，一脸难以置信的表情。看起来，除了赫洛卡之外，其他人都不相信面前的人是真正的罪犯。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡看起来洋洋自得。杰尼娃咬着指甲，似乎在犹豫着要不要说些什么。苏尔贝克静静地看着眼前的工人，显然陷入了沉思。而克莱因一动不动，皱着眉头，一脸难以置信的表情。看起来，除了赫洛卡之外，其他人都不相信面前的人是真正的罪犯。{/n}

languages.text: {n}フロトコは誇らしげで尊大な表情をしている。ジネヴリは何かを言うのをためらうように、爪を噛んでいる。ザウアーバックは無言で労働者を観察し、深く考え込んでいるようだ。一方、クラインは不信感を浮かばせた顔でじっと立っているだけだ。フロトコ以外は、あなたが真犯人を目にしているとは思いもしないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フロトコは誇らしげに見える。ジネブラは何かを言うのをためらうように、爪を噛んでいる。ザウアーバックは無言で労働者を観察し、深く考え込んでいるようだ。一方、クラインは不信感を浮かばせた顔でじっと立っているだけだ。フロトコ以外は、あなたが真犯人を目にしているとは思いもしないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko sieht stolz und selbstgefällig aus. Jinevri kaut auf ihren Nägeln, als würde sie zögern, etwas zu sagen. Sauerback blickt schweigend auf den Arbeiter, offenbar tief in Gedanken versunken. Klein währenddessen steht nur reglos da, mit einem misstrauischen Ausdruck auf der Miene. Von Hrotko abgesehen scheint niemand zu glauben, dass ihr den wahren Täter vor euch habt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko sieht stolz und selbstgefällig aus. Jinevra kauft auf ihren Nägeln herum, als würde sie zögern, etwas zu sagen. Sauerback blickt schweigend auf den Arbeiter, offenbar tief in Gedanken versunken. Klein währenddessen steht nur reglos da, mit einem misstrauischen Ausdruck auf der Miene. Von Hrotko abgesehen scheint niemand zu glauben, dass ihr den wahren Täter vor euch habt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko'nun gururlu ve kendini beğenmiş bir görünümü var. Jinevri, konuşmakta tereddüt edercesine tırnaklarını kemiriyor. Sauerback, işçiyi sessizce gözlemliyor. Görünüşe göre derin düşüncelere dalmış. Bu esnada yüzünü kuşku dolu bakışlar eşliğinde buruşturan Klein, yerinde güç bela durabiliyor. Hrotko dışında hiç kimse, gerçek suçluyla yüz yüze olduğuna inanmıyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hrotko looks proud and self-important. Jinevri is biting her nail, as if hesitant to say anything. Sauerback is observing the worker in silence, apparently sunk deep in thought. Meanwhile, Klein merely stands still with a distrustful grimace on his face. Other than Hrotko, no one here seems to believe that you are looking at the real culprit.{/n}
